definition: Augusta (place name: capital of Maine, city in Georgia etc)
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The burial took place at the Magnolia Cemetery in Augusta, Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 葬禮在佐治亞州奧古斯塔的木蘭墓地舉行。

sentences.english: He got a hole in one today at Augusta National.
sentences.chinese: 今天他在奧古斯塔國家高爾夫球場一桿進洞。

sentences.english: There are some suggestions that they are actually following the memoirs of Augustus.
sentences.chinese: 有人說他們事實上是承認了奧古斯塔斯的自傳的內容。
